artifacts.name: The Name
artifacts.description: The Description. "artifact" is a pattern for matching artifacts using componentId.startsWith(pattern) || component ==~ pattern (a regex match).
artifacts.author: The Author

artifacts.description: This match sets "owner" to "The Owner" for all artifacts starting with "groupid:"
This match sets "name" to "Artifact 1" for all artifacts starting with "groupid:artifactid1:". The "owner" will still be "The Owner" from the previous "groupid:" artifact pattern.
artifacts.name: Artifact 1

artifacts.description: This match sets "name" to "Artifact 2" for all artifacts starting with "groupid:artifactid2:". The "owner" will still be "The Owner" from the previous "groupid:" artifact pattern.
artifacts.name: Artifact 2
